Actions.Name: Jet Cloak
Actions.Description: Create a blast 1 terrain effect. Characters inside are blinded+. This area lasts until this ability is used again or until the end of combat. The Nightcloak may teleport 4 before or after creating this area.

Actions.Name: Steal Sight
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is blinded+. They can end this condition by picking up a valuables token, or ending a turn adjacent to an ally.
